CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Ignore audio focus
CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Audio playback will not stop e.g. when other media is played. Audio playback service needs to be restarted for this option to take effect.

CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Ignore Bluetooth track switch events
CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Do not react to previous/next media keys on Bluetooth devices.

CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Bluetooth popping workaround
CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Some audio receivers enter a power saving mode after some time of inactivity and when resuming playback a loud cracking/popping sound is produced. To prevent this, play a silent audio track when playback is paused. Battery usage might be slightly increased. Audio playback service needs to be restarted for this option to take effect.

CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Don't pause media session
CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Don't let the system know when playback is paused. In some versions of Android this can prevent the system from automatically removing the notification after playback has been paused for a few minutes.
